label: Award certificate or testamur
description: Official award certificate or testamur from your Australian education provider confirming completion of your CRICOS-registered qualification.
what_it_proves: Confirms completion of an eligible qualification at an Australian institution.
common_gaps: Certificate not yet issued — use official completion letter with expected award date
Name on certificate differs from passport name
format_notes: Original or certified copy. If name differs from passport, include a name change document.

label: Official academic transcript
description: Official academic transcript issued by your Australian education provider showing all subjects completed and final grades.
what_it_proves: Provides detailed evidence of course completion and study duration to meet the 2-year minimum study requirement.
common_gaps: Unofficial transcript printed from student portal — must be official sealed copy
Credits from overseas transferred — must show Australian study periods clearly
format_notes: Must be an official sealed or stamped copy. Electronic versions may be accepted if issued by the institution directly.

label: English language test result
description: Test report form from an approved English language test (IELTS, TOEFL iBT, PTE Academic, Cambridge C1/C2, or OET) showing minimum competent English scores.
what_it_proves: Demonstrates the applicant meets the English language requirement for subclass 485.
common_gaps: Test result more than 3 years old at time of decision
One or more band scores below the minimum threshold
Test type not approved for migration purposes
format_notes: Must be the original test report form. Check the current instrument for minimum band scores applicable to 485.

label: eCoE (Electronic Confirmation of Enrolment)
description: Electronic Confirmation of Enrolment from your CRICOS-registered education provider confirming your course details and study period.
what_it_proves: Confirms your enrolment in a CRICOS-registered course — used to verify eligibility period and course duration.
common_gaps: eCoE expired or cancelled — request an updated eCoE from your provider
Course listed on eCoE is not CRICOS registered
format_notes: Issued by education provider electronically. Applicant should have a copy from their student portal.
